name: ERE's A LIVE ONE FOR YA!  (2013) OMAP0030213
description:
Just as you've heard it at a Live gig! "Ere's A LIVE One for Ya" gives you an action packed set of Originals and Covers. 
Only available as Limited Edition physical CD here or from us at gigs .

GOLD DISC ALERT!!! 
For a bit of fun, you might also be lucky enough to get a gold disc when you buy/open your copy??? 
Only 100 Gold copies have been mixed in with the regular ones....

01. Gimme All Your Lovin' (ZZ Top)
 02. Are You Gonna Go My Way (Lenny Kravitz)
 03. Playing With Fire (The Ray Jones Band)
 04. 7 Nation Army (The White Stripes)
 05. Roll With It (Oasis)
 06. Deathwish (The Ray Jones Band)
 07. Born To Be Wild (Steppenwolf)
 08. Silver Days (The Ray Jones Band)
 09. Whiskey In The Jar (Thin Lizzy)
 10. Word Up (Gun/Cameo)
 11. Teenage Kicks (Undertones)
 12. Parklife (Blur)
 13. 2468 Motorway (Tom Robinson Band)
 14. Jumping Jack Flash (The Rolling Stones)
 15. One Way Rider (The Ray Jones Band)
 16. Heartbreaker Who's Fast (The Ray Jones Band)
 17. Alright Now (Free)
 18. Whole Lotta Rosie (AC/DC)

name: The Right Way (2011) OMAP0010807
description:
Officially released in 2011 "The Right Way" has been a great starting point for The Ray Jones Band.
 10 Classic Rock songs plus two Punk ‘Bonus Tracks’
Track .01 and the Single ‘Heartbreaker Who’s Fast’
Track .04 ‘Can't You See ’ – a ballad caught the band by surprise being the most popular downloaded.
 As everyone seems to love the Bonus punk tracks from 
"The Right Way" the band saw it fit to release an animated video of ‘Splatter the Pan’... It's all tongue and cheek, just a laugh to share out around the world! Within days it received over 12’000 hits and went viral in Mexico?!?! (Check the video's) 

01. Heartbreaker Who's Fast
02. Deathwish
03. The Right Way 
04. Cant You See
05. On My Own
06. Keep Freedom Alive 
07. One Way Rider
08. Silver Days 
09. Playing With Fire
10. Black and White
11. Splatter The Pan
12. Urinate
